metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule detects when a service account created

ruleText:
rule GCP_Service_Account_created {

  meta:
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule detects when a service account created"
    severity = "Medium"

  events:
    //Service Account Creation
    $e.metadata.event_type = "USER_RESOURCE_CREATION"
    $e.metadata.log_type = "GCP_CLOUDAUDIT"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "google.iam.admin.v1.CreateServiceAccount"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Google Cloud IAM"
    $e.target.application = "iam.googleapis.com"
    $e.target.resource_ancestors.resource_type = "SERVICE_ACCOUNT"
    $e.target.resource.attribute.labels["request_type"] = "type.googleapis.com/google.iam.admin.v1.CreateServiceAccountRequest"
    $e.target.resource.resource_subtype = "service_account"
    $e.target.resource.resource_type = "SERVICE_ACCOUNT"



  condition:
    $e
}
